page.title: 07A WEEKEND IN WINLATON
page.content: Saturday morning, Dad went to work. The rest of us had a lie in. My brother went to Newcastle.My sister and I watched television and afterwards I went to the village to buy a Father's Day card and two guinea pigs.After dinner I went to Grandma's, while Mam went to Newcastle. I watched T.V.again and then visited my Great Grandma who is eighty five. I stayed the night with my Grandma as my parents were at a wedding reception disco at Spanish City, Whitley Bay. On Sunday morning I walked home with my brother and sister and we played on our bikes. After dinner my parents took us to see The Northumberland Tattoo on 'The Links'. We watched pipe bands, drum bands, Highland Dancers, paratroopers and a motorbike display team.After fish and chips we went home.
